text: The Bernard de Marigny had several famous members : * Augustin Etienne Gaspard Bernard de Marigny ( — 1782), Navy officer during the War of American Independence * Charles-René de Bernard de Marigny (1740-1816), Navy officer during the War of American Independence, the French Revolutionary Wars and the Napoleonic Wars * Gaspard de Bernard de Marigny (1754-1794), general in the counter-Revolutionary Vendean insurrection. Category:French noble families == See also == * Bernard de Marigny
title: Bernard de Marigny (disambiguation)
